mapper.select: SELECT subject_no subjectNo, subject_name subjectName FROM subject LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT subject_no subjectNo, subject_name subjectName, subject_createdate subjectCreateDate, subject_updatedate subjectUpdateDate, subject_totalday sunjectTotalDay, subject_info subjectInfo FROM subject WHERE subject_no = #{subjectNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject ( subject_name, subject_createdate, subject_updatedate, sunject_totalday, subject_info, ) VALUES ( ${subjectName}, NOW(), NOW(), ${sunjectTotalDay}, ${subjectInfo}, )
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET subject_name = #{subjectName}, subject_updatedate = NOW(), sunject_totalday = #{sunjectTotalDay}, subject_info = #{subjectInfo} WHERE subject_no = #{subjectNo}
